slides.title: BODMAS/VBODMAS Rule
slides.content:
**Order of Operations:**

**V**inculum (Bar)
**B**rackets [ ( { } ) ]
**O**f
**D**ivision
**M**ultiplication
**A**ddition
**S**ubtraction

**Remember:** Solve from left to right for operations of same priority

slides.title: Types of Brackets
slides.content:
**Solving order (innermost first):**

1. **( )** - Parentheses/Round brackets
2. **{ }** - Curly brackets/Braces
3. **[ ]** - Square brackets

**Example:** 5 + {2 × (3 + 1)}
= 5 + {2 × 4}
= 5 + 8
= 13

slides.title: Simplification with Fractions
slides.content:
**LCM Method for Addition/Subtraction:**

1/2 + 1/3 - 1/6
= 3/6 + 2/6 - 1/6
= 4/6 = 2/3

**Multiplication:**
Multiply numerators and denominators

**Division:**
Multiply by reciprocal

slides.title: Decimal Simplification
slides.content:
**Addition/Subtraction:**
Align decimal points

**Multiplication:**
Ignore decimals, multiply, count total decimal places

**Division:**
Make divisor a whole number by moving decimal

**Example:** 2.5 × 0.4 = 1.0 (1 decimal place)
